description:

The underside is brighter, with a primarily neon orange outsole that gets hits of purple on the outer traction pods. name: Salomon Men Exit 2 Aero Sports Shoes
description:
Style Note
Exit 2 Aero from salomon is a breathable pair with a leather and mesh upper, and is an ultra-hiking shoe. The sleek profile on this shoe combined with its lightness make it great value for money. It's also great for travel and trekking the trails in warm weather. This is a good quality low hiking shoe with good stability and traction.

Product Details
Anti-debris mesh to avoid debris being trapped between your foot and footbed
Split-suede leather reinforcement provides support and stability with heel foam
Abrasion resistant textile lining
Quick-lacing system
Sensifit upper construction connects to the lace-points for a secure, wrapped Fit
Die-cut EVA sockliner for instep comfort
Advanced Chassis between the midsole and outsole maximizes energy control and push-through performance
Non-marking rubber Conta Grip outsole with all-terrain tread (Delivering optimal traction on varied surfaces, Salomon's Contagrip outsoles use the ideal combination of specialized rubbers for each specific use)
TPU toe cap

Material and Care
Leather, mesh
Wipe surface with a clean, dry cloth to remove dust
Do not machine wash or store in sunlight

name: Salomon Men X-Tracks GTX Black Sports Shoes
description:
Style Note
The salomon X-Tracks GTX is a heavy duty hiking shoe which is ultra-light and styled as a mid-top. This shoe is best for those who combine fast hiking and trail running as it provides the right combo of breathability and insulation. The water resistant textile upper, heel foam and moulded EVA outsole are the best of its kind.

Product Details
GORE-TEX (A membrane/lining that offers durable waterproof protection and is moderately insulated for changing conditions) weather protection that is ideal for people who mix fast hiking and even some trail running into their adventures
Waterproof bootie construction
Quicklace system - pull on toggle straps to tighten the Fit
OS Tendon (Rebound technology running the length of the outsole that provides improved heel-to-toe transition for better runability) Ortholite Sockliner
Moulded EVA (Ethylene-Vinyl Acetate - A polymer used to absorb physical shock) midsole
Non-marking Contagrip outsole

Material and Care
Synthetic, fabric

name: Salomon Men X Ultra Black Sports Shoes
description:
Style Note
salomon X Ultra trail running shoes performs well on all terrains, be it the mountains, water streams or a campsite. The design considerations and materials make the pair a tough, yet comfy foot wear option while braving the elements. The brand's trademark Sensifit secures the in-steps and locks the foot in place while the polyester lining takes the moisture out. The Gore-Tex seam-sealed inner booties gives the wearer's feet good breathability. These shoes also balance well between weight and stability.

Product Details
3D Advanced Chassis between the midsole and outsole maximizes energy control and push-through performance
Quicklace system tightens with a single pull
Sensifit upper construction connects to the lace-points for a secure, wrapped Fit
Energy Cell midsole enhancement controls pronation
Gusseted tongue won’t pinch or bunch
Rubber toe cap protects your toes from rocks and roots

Material and Care
Synthetic, fabric
Wipe surface with a clean, dry cloth to remove dust
Do not machine wash or store in sunlight

name: Salomon Men XR Mission Sports Shoes
description:
Style Note
salomon XR Mission is a neutral shoe that even barefoot/natural runners will love (as it is not weighed down with its various aids). The grooves in the outsole give it enhanced flexibility and this shoe will please forefoot and heel strikers. The XR Mission intended to be a trail shoe but its aggressive tread allows for use on any terrain. Runners describe this shoe as smooth and responsive - as a high end running shoe should be. Suffice it to summarize that these multi-sport shoes provide comfort and support from the gym to the trails!

Product Details
Mesh and synthetic upper
OrthoLite sockliner combines a specific Ortholite foam and an EVA heel cup. Ortholite foam creates a cooler, drier, healthier, better cushioned environment under the foot. It will not break down or lose effectiveness over time
Quick-lacing system with pocket for laces
Moulded EVA midsole
Non-marking rubber Conta Grip outsole with all-terrain tread (Delivering optimal traction on varied surfaces, Salomon's Contagrip outsoles use the ideal combination of specialized rubbers for each specific use)
TPU toe cap protects your toes from rocks and roots

Material and Care
Synthetic, fabric
Wipe surface with a clean, dry cloth to remove dust
Do not machine wash or store in sunlight

name: Salomon Men Techamphibian 3 Black Sports Shoes
description:
Style Note
This mountain shoe is equipped to handle the obstacles in water and land, has a sandal-meets-shoe styling on the upper. This shoe affords the comfort of a shoe with the lightness of a sandal - the Techamphibian 3 has an improved tongue construction and a soft fabric lining. If you're wondering what shoes to wear for your hiking trip where you have to wade through streams, this is the right shoe for you. They are extremely shock absorbent in the heel strike and offer superior grip on wet rock (as the name indicates!). These are also great for rock scrambling on dry land and boulder hopping in water. We're safe in summing up that these are great for just about any outdoor activity!

Product Details
Quick drying, breathable mesh upper which keeps waterborne debris from being sucked under your soles
Quicklace system - pull on toggle straps to tighten the Fit (lace pocket on the tongue)
Articulated collar and re-patterned tongue provide better fit
Textile liner with neoprene and LYCRA for next-to-skin comfort.
Midsoles are compression-moulded EVA with drainage ports
Outsoles are non-marking Water Contagrip rubber.
Low-profile lugged traction with a large contact area and sipes (small slits) for traction on wet surfaces.

Material and Care
Synthetic, fabric
Wipe surface with a clean, dry cloth to remove dust
Do not machine wash or store in sunlight

name: Nike Men Dunk High Shoes
description:
Designed for superior performance and comfort, the nike Dunk High has a high heel counter to provide ample structural support to the ankle, protecting it from sprains and injuries when playing sport. If you enjoy wearing a sporty look, simply pair the Dunk High with jeans and casual tees.

Upper
Perforated toe uppers for added breathable and dry comfort
High profile design provides ankle support
High ankle cup for added support and snug Fit to the back-foot and ankle
Padded tongue and sock-liner for snug fit and added protection from shock
Lace-up system for snug fit

Midsole
Full length EVA midsole for added cushioning and impact protection

Outsole
Flexible multi-directional rubber outsole with a full cup-sole stitch for durability
Semi-circular grooved forefoot with pivot point for easy 180° rotation of the foot without causing injury

shoe care
Wipe surface with soft, clean, damp cloth to remove dust
Do not store in direct sunlight

name: Nike Men Dual Fusion Sports Shoes
description:
These Dual Fusion ST 2 shoes for men from nike with plush cushioning and supportive Fit are designed for serious runners. The single-layer mesh upper gives a breathable, comfortable fit while the phylon midsole gives cushioning, support and stability. Flex-foot grooves at the forefoot gives enhanced flexibility.

Upper
Mesh upper with synthetic overlays
Central lace ups
Padded tongue with branding
Mesh lining in the padded insole

Midsole
Phylon midsole for lightweight comfort

Outsole
nike waffle outsole with deep flex-grooves
Decoupled heel

shoe care
Brush surface with a soft, clean, damp cloth to remove dust
Do not store in direct sunlight

name: Nike Men Downshifter White Sports Shoes
description:
Enjoy your runs in style with the nike Downshifter 4 MSL running shoe. Lightweight and stylish, this pair is worth the add in your wardrobe as it also doubles up as a perfect lifestyle footwear when teamed with jeans and t-shirts.

Upper
Synthetic leather upper with mesh strips on the back foot for breathability and structural comfort
Meshed and padded tongue with a lace-up system for snug Fit and comfort
Cushioned sockliner for in-step comfort
Synthetic overlays with swooshes on the sides for enhanced shoe structure

Midsole
Phylon midsole for lightweight responsive cushioning and shock absorption
Encapsulated Air-Sole unit for enhanced cushioning
External heel counter to lock the foot in place

Outsole
BRS 1000 rubber outsole for durability
Rubber shank for absolute midfoot support and torsional rigidity through midstance
Forefoot flex grooves for smooth transition
Heel scoop for cushioned comfort and impact protection
Multi-directional and multi-depth rectangular and triangle lugs in the forefoot and heel for better grip

Shoe care
Do not machine wash or store in direct sunlight
Remove dust and dirt with dry clean cloth

name: Nike Women Solarsoft Thong II Flip Flops
description:
One look at these flip flops and your feet are bound to sigh with the pleasure of relaxation. The nike Solarsoft thongs are designed keeping in mind absolute cushioned comfort to relax your feet and offer a comfortable ride. It’s so flexible that you can squeeze with all your might and it still bounces back to shape.

Upper
Grooved man-made TPU foot-bed for absolute all-day comfort and massaged feel
Soft rubber straps with a toe separator for abrasion-free support and to hold the foot in place

Outsole
PU outsole with patent pending waffle pattern lugs throughout the foot-bed for absolute grip even on wet surfaces
Warranty for manufacturing defects: 6 months (not valid on products with more than 20% discount)

Flip flop care
Remove dust and dirt with damp clean cloth
Do not store in direct sunlight

name: Nike Men Revolution Sports Shoes
description:
Designed for absolute comfort, the nike Revolution MSL running shoe is stylish and comfortable. It's stylish upper makes it a great lifestyle footwear.

Upper
Heavily meshed upper for breathable comfort, with synthetic overlays for enhanced shoe structure
Lacing system for a snug, customised Fit
Meshed and padded tongue and collar for all-day comfort

Midsole

Outsole

Shoe care

Do not store in direct sunlight

name: Nike Women Free Run+ 3 Green Sports Shoes
description:
If it's unending speed you're looking for, there's no better running shoe than the nike Free Run+ 3 for women. A perfect cross-country shoe, the Free Run+ 3 is employed with DriFit technology that allows water to drain away, keeping your feet dry and comfortable even in wet conditions.

Upper
One-piece, single-layer open-mesh upper for lightweight comfort and breathability
Allows water to drain away keeping the feet dry and fresh even in wet conditions
Internal arch bandage locks down the foot offering a snug, secure Fit and optimal power transfer
Collar lobes provide a snug fit for ultimate heel lock down
Synthetic overlays for zonal support in the heel and toe box for a snug fit without adding unnecessary weight
Sublimated design on mesh gives a fresh feel without adding to the weight
No-sew construction and eyestays limit internal stitching to reduce friction and foot irritation

Midsole
Removable cushioned footbed to accommodate an orthotic
EVA injected midsole for lightweight feel

Outsole
Unique tip to heel nike Free TPU outsole with multi-directional lugs for optimal traction on various surfaces
Vertical and horizontal flex grooves and waffle patterned lugs for added cushioning and flexibility while running

Shoe care
Wipe surface with a soft, clean, damp cloth to remove dust
Do not machine wash or store in direct sunlight

name: Nike Men Zoom Hyperenforcer White Sports Shoes
description:
An aggressive Basketball shoe for the pros, which is styled to please any fashion maven. The nike Hypernforcer XD is a shoe where stability and breathability are equally balanced. These pumped up kicks add a style element to your casual wardrobe and an aura of dominance if you're on the court!

Upper
Hyperfuse construction at the upper for lightweight durability and breathability with mid-top styling
nike Zoom at the forefoot for low-profile, super-responsive cushioning
Basketball-specific rubber crash pad at the heel for cushioning and durability
The Nike Zoom Hyperenforcer PE features Hyperfuse construction, a process that blends three different layers of material to create a nearly seamless one-piece upper
Super-strong, ultra-lightweight Flywire nylon bundles, this shoe keeps the foot locked into place while offering zones of breathability right where you need them
Cushioning at collar for comfort and to keep heel in place
Perforations at tongue for enhanced breathability
Diamond-shaped cut-outs at upper for enhanced ventilation

Midsole
Lightweight Phylon midsole houses a low-profile Nike Zoom air unit, located at the forefoot, the Nike Zoom helps absorb impact while providing responsive cushioning for a comfortable feel.

Outsole
The durable rubber outsole has a modified herringbone pattern that's designed to grip the courts during fast-paced movement
Flex grooves at the forefoot help increase natural range of motion so the foot can quickly move in any direction

Shoe care

Do not store in direct sunlight

name: Nike Men Flex Black Sports Shoes
description:
A running shoe that's in touch with your foot, the nike Flex has 76 sensors to deliver multi-directional flexibility and optimal foot feel on the outsole. The flexibility of the shoes can really be noticed when standing on ones toes, so these shoes are great for both sprinting (on the toes), or easy distance (mid-foot or heel). A runner who puts in a lot of miles each week will appreciate this shoe because it's lightweight and comfortable. On the other hand, a moderate runner will appreciate this shoe because they're not footing extra weight as is the case with some of the heavier running shoes.

name: Nike Men Air Courtballistec 4.1 White Sports Shoes
description:

Upper
Synthetic leather upper for lightweight durability and comfort
Perforated panels on the sides of the midfoot
Honeycomb patterned embossing on the forefoot
Molded overlay at the vamp for durability
Midfoot shank for support and stability during quick movement and directional changes

Midsole

nike Air unit in the heel for cushioning

Outsole

Flex grooves at the outsole for flexibility and enhanced range of motion

Brush surface with a soft, clean, damp cloth to remove dust
Do not store in direct sunlight

description:

Upper
Heavily meshed upper for breathability, with synthetic overlays for enhanced shoe structure

name: Nike Women Air Dictate 2 MSL Sports Shoes
description:
With the nike Air Dictate MSL shoe you can train with comfort and style. Gearing up for any sport requires a demanding aerobic regimen. The nike Air Dictate MSL wraps the foot in soft comfort with an innersleeve, while its low profile ensures a lightweight, low-to-the-ground feel. A mesh upper circulates air with every step to keep the foot cool on hot days, while a modern, streamlined silhouette is marked with Nike branding that make a statement.

Upper
Breathable sandwich mesh upper with synthetic overlays for breathability and support
No-sew overlays in the midfoot offers a secure, irritation-free feel
Extra heel support to lock the backfoot in place and protect it from injuries
Padded lining for a comfortable step in feel
Padded tongue and collar for added comfort
Lace-ups for a snug Fit and to lock the foot in place
Mesh tongue for breathability
Swoosh logo on the sides to create a style statement

Midsole
Air cushioning unit in the pylon midsole guarantees a smooth and responsive ride
Medial and lateral Air-Sole midsole units deliver supreme cushioning

Outsole
BRS 1000 durable rubber outsole for long-lasting wear
Waffle-pattern grip for excellent traction
Heel crash pad helps reduce impacting shock and set the foot up for a smooth transition
TPU shank adds extra support

Shoe care
Remove dust and dirt with a damp, clean cloth
Do not store in direct sunlight or machine wash

name: Nike Women Air Max S2S Grey Sports Shoes
description:
The nike Air Max S2S is popular among acknowledged groups. Offering premium quality and comfort, myntra has jumped the line to bring to you the best of the best running shoes in town. Designed with maximum cushioning and seamless Fit, there's no better running shoe than the nike Air Max S2S.

Upper
Single layer textile upper with strategically placed overlays
Plush collar reduces slippage and provides a great step-in feel
Central lace ups
Padded mesh inner

Midsole
Deep flex grooves at the midsole with Air Max technology
Phylon midsole

Outsole
Rubber outsole with rubber pods at the forefoot and heel
Deep flex grooves
Herringbone patterned grooves on the pods

shoe care
Wipe surface with damp, clean cloth to remove dust
Do not machine wash
Do not store in direct sunlight

Perfect to slip into on a lazy day, to wear at a girly pyjama party or just for after-hours at home, these pyjama sets from SDL Loungewear instantly transport you to a world of calm. Crafted from soft cotton in pretty and feminine styles, they offer exemplary comfort and a flattering Fit.

Product Details
Striped pyjama top in neon pink, grey, black and violet, has a round neck, short sleeves with branding in diamante embellishment above the left hem and vents at the hem
Matching capri pyjama bottoms in black, elasticated waist with drawstrings, pockets on the sides

Material and Care
100% cotton
Machine wash warm
Do not bleach, dry clean or iron on decoration or print
Tumble dry, normal, low heat
Iron low and dry in shade

Size and Fit
Regular fit
The model (height 5'8" and chest 33") is wearing size M
